reviews.title: Great facilities
reviews.text: My husband and I booked this hotel for our final night in Florida before our evening flight back to the Uk, it is very close to the airport. Our intention was to ask to extend the room until 6pm instead of the usual 12pm check out, unfortunately they would not do this without charging for a second night. I was disappointed with this however it was short lived when we saw the room. It was very large, comfortable modern and really clean, the bed was awesome! We used the gym which again was very well equipped and if the weather had been better we would have used the fab pool. We ate sliders in the bar, which were cheap microwaved cardboard, but the happy hour deal on drinks was great.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a Spanish speaking hotel and the majority of the guests were Spanish speaking and rather loud but we had a good nights sleep. I don't like interconnecting doors because of the noise, however ear plugs solved the problem. I booked the room for a great price on Orbitz, would recommend this hotel it's cool!
reviews.title: A must!

reviews.text: We stayed at Aloft twice with my husband, and are planning on staying there again. The hotel is at an awesome location, 5 minutes away from Dolphin mall, 20 min away from the airport and 30 min away from Sawgrass. The staff is super friendly, the hotel is super charming clean and great amenities, very chic. Loved it!
reviews.title: Modern, Beautiful, comfortable, Amazing service. We Felt at home!!

reviews.text: This is one of the best hotels I stayed at, it was more than perfect for our trip. First of all I was realy impressed with the service and how easy everything went. We came tired from our flight and got our room in less than 5 minutes.. other places would take much much more than thas and for chek out if was even faster... the place so beautiful that you don't want to leave, the bed was super comfortable and the room was very modern. I will definitely come back. I Love aLoft Miami Doral.<3
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Can't say enough how nice my stay here has been. Staff eager to help. Great amenities and very clean. Location is great! Close to my client. Also close to Dolphin Mall. Great restaurants. Enjoyed dinner and movie at CineBistro.
reviews.title: Great Modern Hotel at Great Price

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel while attending a two-day conference. I'm glad I stayed here. I liked the whole ambience. The front area is nicely appointed-the front desk reminds me of Virgin Atlantic check-in counters-with a good bar, excellent seating seating area with nice poolside seating, and a tasteful snack shop. The elevators are just off the lobby. Decor on the room levels is nice; it feels like the designers went for trendy on a budget. All the essentials-the bed, shower, sink, the tv, etc.-were of good quality. Towels were a bit short. Room was clean and in good condition. There were some nice clever surprises. I loved the travel magazines, for example.
reviews.title: Cool, affordable, stylish little hotel

reviews.text: The wxyz bar was pleasant. It serves a great 10 dollar breakfast. The bar menu food (for dinner) was probably of the quality I'd prepare if I was eating at home. I'd like to see a little more skill in the execution of the dishes.
reviews.title: Great bargain

reviews.text: While there, I saw what looked like shopping tourists and business people. While not the place to go if you want the South Beach experience, this is good for those who are working or who want to shop.
reviews.title: Great value, top notch hotel, useful amenities.

reviews.text: It was great to check out this relatively new property in Doral. I had a rental car so the suburban location was not an issue for me and I enjoyed the free parking. It's about 45 minutes - 1 hr from the beach. I thought the lounge was a little noisy but I understood that the hotel was trying to make it a nightlife destination. The room was great with big picture windows, a great TV, and a very pleasant bathroom. Hotel staffers were unfailingly pleasant. I would recommend this hotel to travelers who want a safe, chic, affordable hotel. I will definitely consider staying at another Aloft hotel.
reviews.title: Good location for easy access to shopping.
Modern and comfortable
reviews.text: The Aloft is a terrific hotel with great amenities. The room is very comfortable, the bed was great, the TV was hi-def, the bathroom was pleasant, and the shower had immediate hot water. There was a large safe, lots of reading material, good breakfast (not included), good bar, nice lobby furniture, and a terrific infinity pool. I would stay there anytime. Great value too.

I needed to spend 2 nights in Miami to connect to Trinidad and my company placed me at this hotel. A very quaint hotel. Live music at the WXYZ bar. Very clean and well designed bedrooms. Extremely friendly and helpful staff.
reviews.title: Business stopover

reviews.text: And it is well placed in Doral to allow you to move around.
reviews.title: Well done. Great hotel for a reasonable price!

reviews.text: This hotel was conveniently located. Functional and modern decor in the lobby was a plus. The lounge was great place to have a night cap before bed. The rooms were very minimalistic almost to the to the point of being a bit sparse. One of the individuals in my party compared it to a college dorm, as the storage space was lacking. The beds were extremely comfortable. My only negative comment is that the snack area needs more of a hard payment system. We had someone charge our room for a snack that we couldn't have partaken in as we were in Key West all day.
reviews.title: Great hotel for the Price!

reviews.text: Very nice, comfortable and clean room. Friendly staff - excellent customer service. If you are staying in Miami to shop or for business I highly recommend Aloft. The area was surprisingly safe and there was a bar with happy hour and everyone looked like they were enjoying themselves.
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.text: Hip modern decor; comfortable beds; quiet rooms; recharge workout room with everything; pool; lounge area, bar, pool table; 24/7 snacks, salads, wraps; pre-made or made-to-order hot breakfast items, cereal, fruit, bagels. Above all, very helpful and friendly staff, clean property, conveniently located. I cannot say there is one thing lacking. I will definitely be returning again soon.
reviews.title: Like a baby W, functional and modern

reviews.text: We travel a lot. I try to stay in different types of hotels wherever we go to keep things fresh. Simply put....The Aloft Doral is one of the best hotels we've ever stayed in. It is very new and exceptionally trendy. I normally do a good, bad, ugly type of review but there wasn't a whole lot of bad or ugly for this one.
reviews.title: Chic, new....perfect!
